quote: Keep true. Never be ashamed of doing right. Decide what you think is right and stick to it. – George Eliot
fact: The eyes of a donkey are positioned so that it can see all four feet at all times.
joke: Why did the half blind man fall in the well? Because he couldn't see that well!
